list.title: ConnectionParameterError
list.description: Error thrown when connection parameter is missing

list.title: ConstraintsConfig
list.description: An object representing additional constraints on the table. Each key is the constraint name, and the value is the constraint definition.

list.title: DB
list.description: Used to initialize the pg-promise database connection and repository instances.

list.title: ForeignKeyConfig
list.description: Represents the configuration for a foreign key in a database table.

list.title: Model
list.description: Creates an instance of Model.

list.title: Model#aggregate
list.description: Performs an aggregation operation on the database.

list.title: Model#average
list.description: Calculates the average value based on the provided options.

list.title: Model#columnset
list.description: pg-promise columnset object for the model

list.title: Model#count
list.description: Counts the number of documents in the collection that match the given options.

list.title: Model#createTable
list.description: Creates a table that corresponds to the model's schema and writes it to the database

list.title: Model#createTableQuery
list.description: Generates a CREATE TABLE query string based on the model's schema

list.title: Model#delete
list.description: Deletes records from the database based on the provided condition.

list.title: Model#drop
list.description: Drops the table associated with the model.

list.title: Model#findAll
list.description: Fetches all records from the database table

list.title: Model#findAndCountAll
list.description: Fetches all records from the database table and returns the total count of records

list.title: Model#findByPK
list.description: Finds a record in the database by its primary key value.

list.title: Model#findOne
list.description: Finds a single record in the database based on the provided options.

list.title: Model#firstValue
list.description: Retrieves the first value from the database based on the provided options.

list.title: Model#insert
list.description: Inserts a record into the database table

list.title: Model#insertReturning
list.description: Inserts a record into the database table and returns the inserted record or specified columns

list.title: Model#lastValue
list.description: Retrieves the last value based on the provided options.

list.title: Model#max
list.description: Finds the maximum value based on the specified options.

list.title: Model#median
list.description: Calculates the median value based on the provided options.

list.title: Model#min
list.description: Finds the minimum value based on the specified options.

list.title: Model#stddev
list.description: Calculates the standard deviation using the specified options.

list.title: Model#stringAgg
list.description: Aggregates the values of a field into a single string.

list.title: Model#sum
list.description: Calculates the sum of the specified options.

list.title: Model#truncate
list.description: Truncates the table associated with the model.

list.title: Model#update
list.description: Updates records in the database based on the provided data transfer object (DTO) and condition.

list.title: Model#variance
list.description: Calculates the variance of the data based on the provided options.

list.title: QueryOptions
list.description: QueryOptions class to manage and validate query parameters for database operations.

list.title: QueryOptions
list.description:

Removal or modification of this copyright notice is prohibited.

list.title: QueryOptions#Options
list.description: Returns an object containing the query options.

list.title: QueryOptions#Options
list.description: Validates and sets various query parameters for the QueryOptions instance.

list.title: QueryOptions#addAggregate
list.description: Adds an aggregate function to the query.

list.title: QueryOptions#addCondition
list.description: Adds a condition to the query.

list.title: QueryOptions#addJoin
list.description: Adds a JOIN clause to the query.

list.title: QueryOptions#addValue
list.description: Adds a value to the list of parameterized values for prepared statements.

list.title: QueryOptions#reset
list.description: Resets the query options to their default values.

list.title: QueryOptions#setFields
list.description: Sets the fields to select.

list.title: QueryOptions#setGroupBy
list.description: Sets the GROUP BY clause for the query.

list.title: QueryOptions#setLimit
list.description: Sets the LIMIT clause for the query.

list.title: QueryOptions#setOffset
list.description: Sets the OFFSET clause for the query.

list.title: QueryOptions#setOrderBy
list.description: Sets the ORDER BY clause for the query.

list.title: QueryOptions#setTable
list.description: Sets the table for the query.

list.title: QueryOptions.isValidAggregateFunction
list.description: Checks if an aggregate function name is valid.

list.title: QueryOptions.validAggregateFunctions
list.description: Set of valid aggregate functions.

list.title: RepositoriesParameterError
list.description: Error thrown when repositories parameter is missing or invalid

list.title: SelectQueryBuilder
list.description: Represents a query builder for building SELECT queries.

list.title: SelectQueryBuilder#addJoins
list.description: Adds JOIN clauses to the query string.

list.title: SelectQueryBuilder#addWhereClause
list.description: Generate SQL WHERE string based on ConditionsObject

list.title: SelectQueryBuilder#buildAggregateQuery
list.description: Builds an aggregate query based on the query builder properties.

list.title: SelectQueryBuilder#buildQuery
list.description: Builds the query based on the provided parameters.

list.title: SelectQueryBuilder#buildSelectQuery
list.description: Builds and returns the SELECT query based on the configured fields, table, joins, conditions, group by, order by, limit, and offset.

list.title: SelectQueryBuilder.SelectQueryBuilder
list.description: Represents a SelectQueryBuilder.

list.title: UniqueConstraint
list.description: Represents the configuration for a unique constraint in a database table.
